name: leaf-tornado
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 50% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavor_text_entries.black-white:
The user attacks its target by
encircling it in sharp leaves. This attack
may also lower the target’s accuracy.
